name: The Visitor's Sigil
data: It increases the users dexterity pitifully.
It increases the users constitution pitifully.
It increases the users wisdom pitifully.
It increases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration impressively.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'keen strikes'.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
